item.title: 【HD Live Performances】WEB-RiP - Céline Dion - My Heart Will Go On (40th Annual GRAMMY Awards, 1998)
item.description:
On February 25, 1998, Céline Dion took part of the 40th Annual GRAMMY Awards. Céline & Barbra Streisand was nominated for Best Pop Collaboration with Vocals. Céline and Barbra was supposed to perform "Tell Him"-their GRAMMY nominated song however since Barbra had a flu during the rehearsal week and the night of the ceremony, Céline then performed "My Heart Will Go On" at the GRAMMY stage.

In 1999, the song would won two GRAMMYs including the Best Female Pop Vocal Performance and the coveted golden gramophone for the Record of the Year.
